meta.name: description
meta.content: Discovery Charter School serves 4th through 8th grade students and is located in Newark, NJ.

section.p: While our building is closed, school goes on!
You can check the updates from New Jersey Department of Education and the New Jersey Department of Health.
During our traditional Graduation Breakfast, our departing 8th graders took the microphone to share their journey at Discovery and thank their families for the support and inspiration they received.
The Board of Discovery Charter School has asked Denis Cretinon to lead the school after Dr. Hall's retirement.

td.a: Parent Action Meeting Wednesday November 16 at 5:00 pm

footer.aside: Ask Questions • Make It Happen • Consider Others • Collaborate
